definitions.definition: A forward move; improvement or progression.
definitions.example: an advance in health or knowledge

definitions.definition: An amount of money or credit, especially given as a loan, or paid before it is due; an advancement.
An addition to the price; rise in price or value.
definitions.example: an advance on the prime cost of goods

definitions.definition: (in the plural) An opening approach or overture, especially of an unwelcome or sexual nature.
To move forward in space or time.
Completed before necessary or a milestone event.
definitions.example: He made an advance payment on the prior shipment to show good faith.
The advance man came a month before the candidate.
The scouts found a site for an advance base.
